PUBLICATIONS

[Google Scholar] [Academia]

2017

Kashnitsky I, De Beer J, Van Wissen L. 2017. Economic convergence in ageing Europe. NIDI Working Papers 2017/02. [paper]

2016

Kashnitsky I, Gunko M. 2016. Spatial variation of in-migration to Moscow: Testing the effect of housing market. Cities, 59: 30-39. DOI: 10.1016/j.cities.2016.05.025. [postprint]

Kashnitsky I 2016. A cohort is not representative of humanity: Review of “Evidence for a limit to human lifespan.” Publons. DOI: 10.14322/publons.r505407. [paper]

Kashnitsky I, Mkrtchyan N, Leshukov O. 2016. Interregional migration of youths in Russia: a comprehensive analysis of demographic statistics. Educational Studies Moscow, 13(3): 169–203. DOI: 10.17323/1814-9545-2016-3-169-203. [paper] [media: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

Kashnitsky I, De Beer J, van Wissen L. 2016. Decomposition of regional convergence in population ageing across Europe. European Population Conference 2016. Mainz, Germany. [paper] [link]

2015

Kashnitsky I, Gunko M. 2015. Spatial variation of in-migration to Moscow: housing market VS socialist legacy. NIDI Working Papers 2015/3. [paper] [link]

Kashnitsky I. 2015. Youth migration drives the depopulation of periphery. In XV April International Academic Conference on Economic and Social Development. Higher School of Economics: Moscow; 103–113. [paper] [media: 1, 2]

2014

Kashnitsky I, Mkrtchyan N. 2014. Russian periphery is dying in movement: a cohort assessment of Russian internal youth migration based on Census data. NIDI Working Papers 2014/14. [paper] [link]

Kashnitsky I. 2014. Cohort research on Russian youth intraregional migration. European Population Conference 2014. Budapest, Hungary. [paper] [link] [media: 1]

Publications in Russian

Кашницкий ИС, Мкртчян НВ, Лешуков ОВ. 2016. Межрегиональная миграция молодежи в России: комплексный анализ демографической статистики. Вопросы образования 13(3): 169–203. DOI: 10.17323/1814-9545-2016-3-169-203. [paper] [media: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

Кашницкий ИС. 2015. Миграции молодежи в России: влияние на возрастные структуры. In Современные Исследования Миграции Населения, Донец ЕВ, , Чудиновских ОС (eds). Экономический факультет МГУ имени М.В. Ломоносова: Москва; 79–93. [paper] [link]
